page.title: 05A BRAMFIELD MUM
page.content: We moved into Bramfield in July 1983. We had been living in a flat for eight years on a very busy estate. The change was really lovely for me,I felt for a long while as if I were on holiday. Our three children took a while to settle in and adjust to village life. Our two younger children attend a neighbouring village and our eldest son attends the secondary school on the Sele Farm Estate. All three children travel to school by coach. I work at a school in Hertford,I get a lift in, in the mornings and go home by taxi.
